names.english: tonify the kidneys and dredge stagnation decoction
names.commonEnglish: Tonify the Kidneys and Dredge Stagnation Decoction

actions: Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and tonifies Jing and Blood.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang,
benefits Jing and marrow and warms the Womb.
With Ba Ji Tia, tonifies Yang without injuring Yin.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, stops uterine bleeding, calms the fetus and prevents miscarriage.
Promotes the movement of Blood, promotes lactation and invigorates the channels.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and clears Deficiency Heat.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin, benefits Jing and brightens the eyes.
Breaks up Blood Stasis and invigorates Blood circulation.

With Hong Hua, invigorates the Blood for all types of Blood Stagnation such as dysmenorrhea, amenorrhea with abdominal pain, clotting and scanty flow, swollen painful sores and chest pain due to Blood Stasis.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels, unblocks menstruation and alleviates pain.
Nourishes Blood, harmonizes the collaterals, moderates the Spleen, relaxes the Liver and alleviates pain.
With Chai Hu, for flank pain due to Liver Qi Stagnation.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
Promotes the movement of Qi, reduces distention and pressure and resolves hardenings Removes stagnated food.
Spreads Liver Qi and relieves Stagnation.
With Bai Shao, for Liver Blood Deficiency with Liver Qi Stagnation.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
Supplements the Kidneys
Warms Yang
Nourishes Yin
Dredges the Liver
Invigorates the Blood
Breaks up Stasis
syndromes: Kidney Deficiency with Liver Qi Stagnation

symptoms: Profuse or scanty dark Blood with small clots
Distention and pain in the lower abdomen during menstruation
Profuse thick or thin vaginal discharge

notes: Begin seven days after the onset of menstruation and continue until the next onset. Take twice a day.
